amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the emergency designation requirement for Guard and Reserve funding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that $603,972,000 of the amounts appropriated for the Defense Emergency Response Fund be subject to emergency designation instead of $1,393,972,000 as provided in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 216 (Roll no. 201).
